#summary UseCase: MakeTest
#labels UseCase,Teacher

==UseCases==


= MakeTest =


|| Use Case || MakeTest ||
||Identified || T6 ||
|| Description: || The MakeTest use case models a Teacher creating an Online Test. ||
||Actor(s)|| Teacher ||
||Preconditions: || 1. Teacher must be successfully logged in via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when a Teacher navigates to the "My Tests" page.||
||                ||2. The system will display a list of the Teacher's useable tests.  The teacher selects "Make New Test". ||
||                ||3. A Graphical Interface for creating a test will be displayed.||
||                ||   Consult the Test Editor (TE-) use cases for details.||
||                ||4. When the Teacher is finished making their test:||
||                ||4.1 The Teacher selects "Save and Quit".  This completes the use case.||
||                ||4.2 The Teacher selects "Discard Test".  This completes the use case.||
||Post Condition:|| 1. The Teacher will be routed back to their "My Tests", where, if it was completed/saved, the new test will be shown. ||
